page.title: 01Around Southern Yeovil.
page.content: A{mainly rural landscape}dominated by working farmland on the southern side of a medium sized town. The majority of the farmland is used for growing grain and grass for the{dairy {industry.}The towns most important industry is the helicopter manufacturing at{Westlands Helicopter {Ltd.}We also have a very large{leather processing plant that used to be used for glove manufacturing called Pittards Ltd. There is also Pen Mill Trading Estate which has a variety of light industries. Housing is a mixture of houses built since the turn of the century. We have two British Rail stations; Yeovil Pen Mill and Yeovil Junction. The main road is the A30 which goes from London to Cornwall. Two interesting{tourism}features the Silk and Butterfly farms on the Compton House Estate.
